body_html:
I definitely dont know much about bazel but found an easy fix:

open the.bzl files generating the error, repositories.bzl and workspace.bzl
change all the check_version("...") to check_version("0.10.0") then run

bazel build --config=opt --incompatible_load_argument_is_label=false --incompatible_disallow_uncalled_set_constructor=false //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

worked for me, hope it helps

note: I'm running cuda 9.1

body:
I definitely dont know much about bazel but found an easy fix: 

open the.bzl files generating the error, repositories.bzl and workspace.bzl
change all the `check_version("...")` to `check_version("0.10.0")` then run

`bazel build --config=opt --incompatible_load_argument_is_label=false --incompatible_disallow_uncalled_set_constructor=false //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package`

worked for me, hope it helps

note: I'm running cuda 9.1
